thread.title: Pink tramples any rumors that Lady Gaga copied her moves | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Pink tramples any rumors that Lady Gaga copied her moves | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Pink tramples any rumors that Lady Gaga copied her moves | Daily Mail Online
text: Share She complimented the six-time Grammy winner further. 'Her voice was powerful and beautiful, her outfits were on point, choreography stellar, her heart was in it and she sang about love and inclusiveness, all in front of millions and millions of people.' Soaring high: In the mother-of-two's post, she asked fans 'Who cares if I flew first?' while pointing out other performers who have also soared high in front of audiences She continued to heap praise on the Million Reasons artist, saying: 'Let's celebrate a woman who has the guts to jump off a roof and stand up there in the first place. 'Who cares if I flew first? Cause I didn't! Cirque and Peter Pan been in the air for years.' At the end of the post her message pivoted to the political. 'Now can we get back to the real controversy? The one where our so called leader is stripping our humanity away minute by minute...' Opinionated: She finished the post by asking fans to get back to 'the real controversy', referring to new US President Donald Trump. Here the star appears with husband Carey Hart and their daughter Willow and son Jameson She added the tags: #womensupportingwomen', '#happymonday', and '#letsnotgetdistracted' to drive her point home. Since President Trump's election back in November, the star has been more than vocal about his distaste for the Commander in Chief. Back in January, the So What singer was one of the many celebs to join the Women's March Los Angeles held in opposition of the real estate mogul turned politician. Share or comment on this article 90
